description: Lists all the data cell filters on a table.

parameters.name: Table
parameters.description: A table in the Glue Data Catalog. CatalogId (string) --- The identifier for the Data Catalog. By default, it is the account ID of the caller. The name of the database for the table. Unique to a Data Catalog. A database is a set of associated table definitions organized into a logical group. You can Grant and Revoke database privileges to a principal. Name (string) --- The name of the table. TableWildcard (dict) --- A wildcard object representing every table under a database. At least one of TableResource$Name or TableResource$TableWildcard is required.

nested_params.name: CatalogId
nested_params.description: The identifier for the Data Catalog. By default, it is the account ID of the caller.

nested_params.name: DatabaseName
nested_params.description: The name of the database for the table. Unique to a Data Catalog. A database is a set of associated table definitions organized into a logical group. You can Grant and Revoke database privileges to a principal.

nested_params.name: TableWildcard
nested_params.description: A wildcard object representing every table under a database. At least one of TableResource$Name or TableResource$TableWildcard is required.

nested_items.name: TableCatalogId
nested_items.description: The ID of the catalog to which the table belongs.

nested_items.name: DatabaseName
nested_items.description: A database in the Glue Data Catalog.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name given by the user to the data filter cell.

nested_items.name: ColumnNames
nested_items.description: A list of column names and/or nested column attributes. When specifying nested attributes, use a qualified dot (.) delimited format such as 'address'.'zip'. Nested attributes within this list may not exceed a depth of 5.

nested_items.name: ExcludedColumnNames
nested_items.description: Excludes column names. Any column with this name will be excluded.

nested_items.name: VersionId
nested_items.description: The ID of the data cells filter version.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A continuation token, if not all requested data cell filters have been returned.
